entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of rain or snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 12:28 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
